Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Three Pieces from Cinderella, op. 95

1942

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 10' 30"

  • 1. Pavane
  • 2. Gavotte
  • 3. Valse lente

These pieces are arrangements of music from the ballet Cinderella (op. 87). Prokofiev also created three orchestral suites from the ballet: op. 107, op. 108 (which includes no. 2 of op. 95) and op. 109 (which includes nos. 1 and 3 of op. 95).

1. Pavane

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Gavotte

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Valse lente

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
